## 3.1 Data sources

This is a stylised model.  All data are synthentic.

## 3.2 Pre-processing

No additional pre-processing of data was undertaken.

## 3.3. Input parameters

## Sampling distributions

| Activity                                            | Distribution                  |
|-----------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------|
| Patient inter-arrival time                          | Exponential(100.0 / 60.0)     |
| Call duration                                       | Triangular(5.0, 7.0, 15.0)    |
| Chance nurse callback                               | Bernoulli(0.40)               |
| Nurse call duration                                 | Uniform (10.0, 20.0)          |
